item.title: Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard - Ashton Kutcher

But in retrospect, if I’m being dead honest, after he left, it occurred to me, I stopped short of what I should have really said, as you will hear.

item.title: Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard - Introducing: Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard
item.description: 0:00 Hello and welcome to the armchair expert. I’m Dax Shepard and I’m Monica Patman. Welcome, Monica. Let’s tell everyone what this podcast is all about. What? Because there’s so many. How would you select 1 billion? There’s one, there’s over a billion known podcast. Some of them aren’t even known yet. 0:15 And so we just want to tell you a little bit. What about what makes this one unique?
